name: Jig'Oku
description:
This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2016, which theme was "Ritual"

The game was designed to be played solo, but since it is really challenging, we encourage you to play in collaboration with an other player (one of the player use the keyboard, the other one the mouse).

You will find all the instructions you need through the Main Menu, by clicking on instructions.

We spent some extra time after the global game jam to polish the game. If you want to see the original work we submitted at the end of the jam, head here : http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/jigoku
